TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Script/KernelID extends Android.Renderscripts.BaseObj

Docs.summary: KernelID is an identifier for a Script + root function pair.

remarks.para:
KernelID is an identifier for a Script + root function pair. It is used as an identifier for ScriptGroup creation.
This class should not be directly created. Instead use the method in the reflected or intrinsic code "getKernelID_funcname()".
